title: banning for leaving
body: I know this game is in early development but the afk rules are just not fair, no matter what I do once I start a game I have no option of leaving the game so one day I went down for breakfeast and after I got afk banned for breakfeast now I have to wait 5 minuets before playing because of this. it is unfair to add these ruled and have no way toleave the game I am a bit sick I am considering leavng the game, please fix this.

replies.body: When you leave your team has to play 4v5 and has a high chance of loosing. Ofcouse you get punished for it. If you dont know if you have enough time to play a full round dont start it. This game is not in early development and the rule of not leaving has been in place for a long time.

League has been up and running since about 2009! Welcome to the Rift!!{{summoner:31}} 

As TimeThief said, anytime you intentionally leave a game your other teammates are automatically at a disadvantage. We have to help preserve the cooperative aspect of the game, and would not be able to do so if team members were constantly abandoning each other.
